The Christian Armor. 

     The apostle says: "Put on the whole armor of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil. For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places. Wherefore take unto you the whole 
                                                                           57
armor of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand. "Stand therefore, Having your loins girt about with truth, And having on the breastplate of righteousness; And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel 
     of peace; Above all, taking the shield of faith, Wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts 
     of the wicked. And take the helmet of salvation, And the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God; Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the 
     Spirit, And watching thereunto with all perseverance and 
     supplication for all saints." Ephesians 6:11-18.
